note.p: Birth: Sauquoit, New York, USA (08 or 18 November 1810)

Career: Gave up medicine; Curator and Librarian, New York Lyceum of Natural History (1835); wrote 'Elements of botany'; one of the first to accept and defend natural selection; Professor of Natural History, Harvard (1842-1872); Director, Botanical Gardens, Cambridge, Massachusetts (to 1872)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1889 vol 46 pp xv-xviii signed by J D H
Notes: DSB gives birth date as 18 November 1810.
